description: NTS Map: 092G03Another in the series from Peggy Moire, our Senior Contributor, offering a picturesque walk with some interesting things to see. Activities include walking, nature study, picknicking, bar fishing, canoeing, Hertiage building visits, running, or, chilling out.  Access to the park is from 62B street in Delta, 2.5km east of the south end of Massey tunnel.  All year round access.
title: Deas Slough Walk
